type.name: Test
type.desc: The test type which can also be a test suite. The reducer will check for the presence of the `fn` property to decide whether to run as a test or a test suite.
type.prop: The name of the test or a test suite.
Any context constructors for the test to be evaluated.
The timeout for the test, context evaluation and destruction.
The property of the test suite such that it is focused.
Whether the test suite has focused tests.
